data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in Eibar.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Eibar are coming forward and Bryan Salvatierra gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 4, Alaves have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Eibar.
Pedro Leon scores to make it 0-1 at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 8, Free kick Eibar.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
Can Eibar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
In the minute 10, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
Alaves push upfield but Carlos Del Cerro Grande quickly pulls them for offside.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Alaves a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Ball safe as Eibar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Eibar in the half of Alaves.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 14, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Eibar throw-in in Alaves's half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Eibar to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
In the minute 16, It's a goal kick for the home team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Eibar's Kike misses with an attempt on goal.
Alaves have a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Alaves in the half of Eibar.
Eibar needs to be cautious. Alaves have an attacking throw-in.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Alaves throw-in in Eibar's half.
In the minute 19, Eibar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
In the minute 21, Eibar's Takashi Inui breaks free at Estadio de Mendizorroza. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 22, Joselu of Alaves gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Eibar at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 24, Alaves have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
Eibar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in Alaves.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
Alaves are pushing forward but Deyverson's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 28, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Eibar a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Alaves goal kick.
The match at Estadio de Mendizorroza has been interrupted briefly for a check on Fernando Pacheco, who is down injured.
In the minute 33, Fernando Pacheco is back on the pitch.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Alaves.
Alaves have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
In the minute 35, Alaves's Deyverson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Eibar have a goal kick.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a throw-in for Eibar, close to Alaves's area.
In the minute 37, In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Alaves's Joselu gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Eibar defender.
Eibar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Edgar Mendez (Alaves) has received a yellow card from Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Eibar drives forward and Takashi Inui gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Eibar.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Eibar.
Goal! Alaves go level at 1-1 through Edgar Mendez in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
That's a fine assist from Luis Rioja.
In the minute 42, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the home team a throw-in.
Eibar are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In Vitoria-Gasteiz a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 44, Deyverson for Alaves gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Eibar's half?
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Eibar at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
Deyverson puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
In the minute 45, Joselu with an assist there.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Pape Diop is on a sub for Sergio Alvarez for Eibar.
The away team replace Pedro Leon with Kevin Rodrigues.
Free kick for Eibar in their own half.
In the minute 48, Alaves have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Alaves close to the penalty box.
Eibar have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
In the minute 50, Kike (Eibar) strikes at Estadio de Mendizorroza but his header is cleared.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
Eibar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 53, Eibar have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Alaves in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Alaves in the half of Eibar.
Free kick for Eibar in their own half.
Throw-in Eibar.
In the minute 56, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Eibar in their own half.
Rodrigo Battaglia is booked for the home team.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Alaves to take a throw-in in Eibar territory.
Free kick for Alaves in the half of Eibar.
Alaves surge into the attack at Estadio de Mendizorroza but Joseluâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 59, Goal kick for Eibar at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Eibar throw-in in Alaves's half.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Jose Luis Mendilibar (Eibar) is making a third substitution, with Recio replacing Takashi Inui.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Eibar in their own half.
In the minute 62, Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Eibar.
Tomas Pina (Alaves) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Eibar in their own half.
Eibar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Alaves is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 66, Free kick Alaves.
Can Alaves get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Eibar's half?
Can Eibar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Alaves's half?
In the minute 69, Eibar to take a throw-in in Alaves territory.
Corner awarded to Eibar.
Throw-in for Eibar in the half of Alaves.
In the minute 70, Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Alaves a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
At Estadio de Mendizorroza, Alaves are penalized for being offside.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 73, Alaves make their first substitution with Martin Aguirregabiria replacing Edgar Mendez.
Manu Garcia is replacing Rodrigo Battaglia for the home team.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Eibar in the half of Alaves.
Throw-in Alaves.
Alaves awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 76, In Vitoria-Gasteiz, Alaves push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Alaves in their own half.
Eibar are whistled for offside.
In the minute 77, Unai Arietaleanizbeaskoa Bergara is on a sub for Edu Exposito for Eibar.
Eibar advance rapidly upfield but Carlos Del Cerro Grande blows for offside.
Alaves to take a throw-in in Eibar territory.
In the minute 79, Alaves's Joselu fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Ball safe as Eibar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 80, Alaves awarded a free kick in their own half.
Bryan Salvatierra (Eibar) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a Alaves throw-in in Eibar's half.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Alaves in their own half.
The away team have replaced Esteban Burgos with Quique. This is the fifth substitution made today by Jose Luis Mendilibar.
Alaves's Luis Rioja gets in a shot on goal at Estadio de Mendizorroza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 87, Eibar's Bryan Salvatierra is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Eibar at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Alaves in their own half.
In the minute 88, Eibar's Unai Arietaleanizbeaskoa Bergara has been booked in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande signals a free kick to Eibar.
Pablo Machin is making the team's third substitution at Estadio de Mendizorroza with Adrian Marin replacing Luis Rioja.
In the minute 89, Victor Laguardia (Alaves) has received a first yellow card.
Alaves are pushing forward but Joselu's finish is wide of the goal.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande awards Eibar a goal kick.
Carlos Del Cerro Grande will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Can Eibar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Alaves's half?
Throw-in for Alaves at Estadio de Mendizorroza.
Free kick for Eibar in their own half.
Eibar have been awarded a corner by Carlos Del Cerro Grande.
Kike (Eibar) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vitoria-Gasteiz.
Can Eibar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Alaves's half?
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Ruben Duarte is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Ruben Duarte (Alaves) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Jota.
